text: And to this day, my Mom is my role model.
author: Paul Ryan

text: A Romney-Ryan administration will protect and strengthen Medicare, for my Mom's generation, for my generation, and for my kids and yours.
author: Paul Ryan

text: What makes me happy is just curling up in with my mom in her bed and watching a marathon of 'CSI' and 'Grey's Anatomy' episodes with pints of ice cream.
author: Taylor Swift

text: I started cooking when I was about 10. I have memories like when I was 6 or 7 with my mom, and when I was 12 I started getting real serious about cooking.
author: Emeril Lagasse

text: Studies show that children best flourish when one mom and one dad are there to raise them.
author: John Boehner
